triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper develops a dataset specifically for improving dialogue systems and dialog management research.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the core field enabling the understanding and labeling of dialogue content in the dataset.

triples.name: Dialog act
triples.relevance: The paper proposes manually labeling dialogues with communication intention, which aligns with dialogue act classification.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: Emotion labeling in the dataset relates to sentiment and emotion analysis techniques in NLP.

triples.name: Labeled data
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a manually labeled dataset, which is a key contribution of labeled training data for dialogue research.
